column4: Oh no, I forgot to buy an After Pill! What now?
Ugh... Looks like I will have to accept that she might get pregnant.
I want you to take the pill.""
Please don't misunderstand this. It's not that I don't treasure our relationship. If anything, it's because I treasure it that I'm asking this.
I want to do things properly between us, I don't want you to suffer just because of me and my selfishness.
I'll take the pill, don't worry.

column5: I want you to have the baby.""

column4: You know you'll have to take responsibility, right?
I know, trust me, I will.
Is it wrong that I'm already hoping that I might get pregnant?
